item.description:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827 && specialAmount > 74 && specOn && AttackingOn2.currentHealth > 0){ specialAtk(true, 75, 250, 426); hitDiff = 5+misc.random(30); getHit(30); rangeGFX(85, 672); rangeGFX(65, 672); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); specAttack(); usingSpecial = true; }
